name: Rollbit Coin
description: Rollbit Coin (RLB) is a cryptocurrency that functions as a utility token within the Rollbit platform, a prominent crypto casino and trading platform. Launched in February 2020, RLB was introduced to provide various benefits to its holders, enhancing their experience on the platform. These benefits include increased rakeback, reduced trading fees, and eligibility to participate in the RLB Lottery, a unique feature that allows token holders to win a share of the casino's profits.
